issue.title: [Release][Dev] Port the release note generation script to archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Archery already have a couple of utilities to parse commits between revisions and access various metadata from git. Implementing it python would make it more portable (e.g. `date` function is different from `GNU date` on macOS).

We can more easily filter out the noisy author/committer data as well.
